name: Fighter
description: Skilled warrior. Gains the Cleave trait at level 2 and two attacks per round at level 4.

name: Cleric
description: A capable combatant with divine magic as well.

name: Ranger
description: Adept for survival in the wild, skilled with a bow, and learns a few spells at later levels. Gains Point Blank Shot trait at level 2.

name: Wizard
description: The Wizard class is capable of casting powerful arcane spells.

name: Thief
description: The thief uses agility and stealth to manage a battle field and is useful in finding and disarming traps.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: The bounty hunter is a thief that uses force in addition to agility and stealth, and is less effective than a traditional thief at resolving traps and locks.
